extendedInfo.description: In the darkest of occasions when the night is at its peak, these pretty flowers are a beacon of light for the beauty and life of the world. These exotic plants, beautiful flowers and pretty leaves are lifeless without the color effects. So take out your gardening kits and color every plant and petal to brighten up the garden. Color Me Flowers is a coloring game to paint the world with bright enough twisted and crazy colors. Bring back the garden seasons of flowers and leaves. Find your way to the best color combination for them. Have fun!***How To Play***â Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are done***Itâs fully featured with***â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬ of color touch effectsâ Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted color flashlightâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this interactive touching coloring book, a distraction-free music plays behind to boost up his  creative thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât feel like erasing it all? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the flashing sketch your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery I play this too! And I am sure your toddler will have fun to color the flowers too. So get it on your device now to enjoy this kid coloring delightful game.â¨***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: It would be 0 stars. I kept trying to color and everytime I started an advertisement popped up... And when I exited the ad it was completely erased... Don\'t waste your Time...
reviews.author: Ashley Hamm-Goolsby

reviews.title: Missing something
reviews.comment: It would be perfect if it had a fill with color option.
reviews.author: iris sanchez

reviews.title: Difficult
reviews.comment: Good concept too difficult to do detail coloring, need ability to zoom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its a great app......... especially when ur bored ^.^
reviews.author: A Google User
